wikipedia_page.main: Ruaridh McConnochie (born 23 October 1991) is a men's rugby union player. He was a member of the silver medal winning team in Rugby sevens at the 2016 Summer Olympics, and a full England International, making his debut against Italy at St James's Park in September 2019.
